languages.text: {n}Маражай недобро ухмыляется.{/n} "Значит, вот какова хозяйка обгорелого зверька. Возможно, стоит известить ее о судьбе ее дражайшего последователя..."
{n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un ricanement.{/n} « Voilà donc la maîtresse de l'animal brûlé. Nous devrions peut-être l'informer du sort de son fidèle compagnon... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un ricanement.{/n} « Voilà donc la maîtresse de l'animal brûlé. Nous devrions peut-être l'informer du sort de son fidèle compagnon... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが不敵に笑う。{/n}「これが焼かれたペットの飼い主か。大事な従者の運命を知らせてやったほうがいいだろう…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが不敵に笑う。{/n}「これが焼かれたペットの飼い主か。大事な従者の運命を知らせてやったほうがいいだろう…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嗤笑一声。{/n}“原来，她就是那只烧坏了脸的宠物的主人。或许应该告诉她，她珍爱的追随者发生了什么事情……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嗤笑一声。{/n}“原来，她就是那只烧坏了脸的宠物的主人。或许应该告诉她，她珍爱的追随者发生了什么事情……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verzieht verächtlich das Gesicht.{/n} "Das ist also die Besitzerin des verbrannten Haustiers. Vielleicht sollten wir sie über das Schicksal ihres geliebten Spielzeugs informieren ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verzieht verächtlich das Gesicht.{/n} "Das ist also die Besitzerin des verbrannten Haustiers. Vielleicht sollten wir sie über das Schicksal ihres geliebten Spielzeugs informieren ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Así que esta es la propietaria de la mascota quemada. Tal vez debamos contarle lo que ha pasado con su fiel seguidor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Así que esta es la propietaria de la mascota quemada. Tal vez debamos contarle lo que ha pasado con su fiel seguidor...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir şekilde dudağını büküyor.{/n} "Yanık evcil hayvanının sahibi bu demek. O çok değerli takipçisine ne olduğunu söylesek mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sneers.{/n} "So this is the burnt pet's owner. Perhaps we should inform her about the fate of her prized follower..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai alaycı bir şekilde dudağını büküyor.{/n} "Demek yanmış evcil hayvanının sahibi bu. Belki de o çok değerli takipçisine ne olduğunu ona söylemeliyizdir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
